member.comment: Specifies the Baseband Resource (FSPC board) where the internal addresses shall be distributed. Id values are specified in file Glo_bs.h: #define FSM1_FSP1 #define FSM1_FSP2 #define FSM1_FSP3 #define FSM2_FSP1 #define FSM2_FSP2 #define FSM2_FSP3
